TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventHandler(object sender, InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.summary: Represents the method that handles two events raised when changes occur on an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas">: the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionMoving> event, or the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionResizing> event.
